001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.ArrayException;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.ArrayList;
022import java.util.List;
023
024import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
025
026/**
027 * Implements the XPath 3.1 <a href=
028 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-put">array:put</a>
029 * function.
030 */
031public final class ArrayPut {
032  @NonNull
033  private static final String NAME = "put";
034  // CPD-OFF
035  @NonNull
036  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
037      .name(NAME)
038      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY)
039      .deterministic()
040      .contextIndependent()
041      .focusIndependent()
042      .argument(IArgument.builder()
043          .name("array")
044          .type(IArrayItem.type())
045          .one()
046          .build())
047      .argument(IArgument.builder()
048          .name("position")
049          .type(IIntegerItem.type())
050          .one()
051          .build())
052      .argument(IArgument.builder()
053          .name("member")
054          .type(IItem.type())
055          .zeroOrMore()
056          .build())
057      .returnType(IArrayItem.type())
058      .returnOne()
059      .functionHandler(ArrayPut::execute)
060      .build();
061  // CPD-ON
062
063  private ArrayPut() {
064    // disable construction
065  }
066
067  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
068  @NonNull
069  private static <T extends ICollectionValue> ISequence<? extends IArrayItem<T>> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
070      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
071      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
072      IItem focus) {
073    IArrayItem<T> array = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
074        arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
075    IIntegerItem position = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
076    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
077    T member = (T) arguments.get(2).toCollectionValue();
078
079    return put(array, position, member).toSequence();
080  }
081
082  /**
083   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
084   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-put">array:put</a>.
085   *
086   * @param <T>
087   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
088   * @param array
089   *          the target Metapath array
090   * @param positionItem
091   *          the integer position of the item to replace
092   * @param member
093   *          the Metapath item to replace the identified array member with
094   * @return a new array containing the modification
095   * @throws ArrayException
096   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
097   */
098  @NonNull
099  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> put(
100      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
101      @NonNull IIntegerItem positionItem,
102      @NonNull T member) {
103    return put(array, positionItem.asInteger().intValueExact(), member);
104  }
105
106  /**
107   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
108   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-put">array:put</a>.
109   *
110   * @param <T>
111   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
112   * @param array
113   *          the target Metapath array
114   * @param position
115   *          the integer position of the item to replace
116   * @param member
117   *          the Metapath item to replace the identified array member with
118   * @return a new array containing the modification
119   * @throws ArrayException
120   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
121   */
122  @NonNull
123  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> put(
124      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
125      int position,
126      @NonNull T member) {
127    List<T> copy = new ArrayList<>(array);
128    try {
129      copy.set(position - 1, member);
130    } catch (IndexOutOfBoundsException ex) {
131      throw new ArrayException(
132          ArrayException.INDEX_OUT_OF_BOUNDS,
133          String.format("The position %d is outside the range of values for the array of size '%d'.",
134              position,
135              copy.size()),
136          ex);
137    }
138
139    return IArrayItem.ofCollection(copy);
140  }
141}
